job.title: Senior Software Test Engineer
job.description: strongJob SummarybrstrongThe Senior Software Developer in Test is responsible for ensuring that the software systems built at iHerb can be validated against expected behavior by developing and maintaining test automation programs This role is responsible for understanding software engineering principles and developing test automation softwarebrbrbrstrongJob Expectations brstrongulliAnalyze user stories to develop comprehensive test cases for functional integration and performance testing liliMonitor maintain and continuously improve existing automated regression tests liliWrite test automation programs that are easy to maintain and extend liliCollaborate with Product and UX teams to define acceptance criteria for user stories liliParticipates in special projects and performs other duties as assigned liulThe duties and responsibilities described above may provide only a partial description of this position This is not an exhaustive list of all aspects of the job Other duties and responsibilities not outlined in this document may be added as necessary or desirable with or without noticebrbrbrstrongRequiredbrbrstrongstrongKnowledge Skills and AbilitiesbrstrongulliFamiliar with modern software architecture such as micro services eventdriven architectures and containers liliExperience with test automation technology using Appium selenium or similar liliExperience implementing test automation in BDD  POM framework liliExperience with API automation using POSTMAN RestAssured or Karate liliPerformance testing experience using Jmeter blaze meter or similar for web mobile and backend applications liliExperience with Testcase management tools like TestRails and CICD tools like Jenkins liliMobile testing experience using saucelabs browserstack or similar liliProgramming experience in one or more of the following languages Python JavaJavaScriptC ObjectiveC and Swift liliExperience in backend integration and end to end test would be a plus liliAble to identify areas of ambiguity in testing liliAbility to understand loosely defined specifications and discovery of software behaviors via adhoc methods liliStrong ownership instincts and being able to mentor junior team members liliExcellent organization skills and ability to effectively communication with teams brliulstrongEquipment Knowledge brstrongulliExperience with Microsoft Office Suite Word Excel PowerPoint liliExperience with Google Business Suite Gmail Drive Docs Sheets Forms preferred brliulstrongExperience RequirementsbrstrongGenerally requires a minimum of eight 8 plus years of experience in test automation and quality assurancebrbrbrstrongEducation RequirementsbrstrongA bachelors Degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experiencebrbrbrstrongJudgmentReasoning Abilitystrong Able to identify troubleshoot and resolve problems quickly using sound judgment poise and diplomacy Ability to use judgment and reasoning skills and determine when to escalate issues as required in a timely mannerbrbrbrstrongPhysical Demands strongThe physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by a Team Member to successfully perform the essential functions of this job While performing the duties of this job the Team Member is regularly required to talk and hear The Team Member is frequently required to sit walk climb stairs use hands and fingers bend stoop and reach with hands and arms Reaching above shoulder heights below the waist or lifting as required to file documents or store materials throughout the work day The Team Member may occasionally lift or move office products and supplies up to 25 pounds Proper lifting techniques required Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functionsbrbrbrstrongWork Environmentstrong The noise in the work environment is usually moderate Other factors arebrulliHectic fastpaced with multilevel distractions liliProfessional yet casual work environment liliOffice  Warehouse environment liliAbility to work extended hours as required brliulstrongAbout IHerbbrstrongiHerb is a leading global ecommerce retailer with an emphasis on providing an exceptional selection of nutritional and wellness products for the past 25 years With over 30000 products shipped to over 180 countries we provide the best overall value for natural products through an innovative and efficient supply chain processbrbrOur teams have a strong sense of commitment and pride in their work which has allowed us to grow even during the recent pandemic At iHerb our purpose is to empower people to enhance their health happiness and wellbeing  that starts with valuing our team members by providing a positive work environment with competitive benefits Our five shared values unite our team members across the globe and provide a stable foundation These values speak to who we are the culture were building and how every single team member contributes to our larger company visionbrbrbrstrongiHerbs Shared ValuesbrstrongFocus on the Customerbrulli Empower Our Peoplelili Be Entrepreneurial amp Pivot Quicklylili Embrace Diversity amp Inclusionlili Strive for SimplicitybrliulstrongIHerb BenefitsbrstrongAt iHerb we are dedicated to offering programs designed to help our employees and their families stay healthy live well and plan for the financial future Built on a strong foundation our programs provide options and upgrades with flexibility protection and security in mind Below is a snapshot of the benefits we offer our team members For a more comprehensive listing visit wwwiHerbBenefitscombrulliMedical Care Starting in 2021 iHerb covers 100 of the associated cost for medical benefitsliliDental and Vision benefitsliliSafe Harbor 401k  company match 100 of the first 6 of the employees contributionliliCompanypaid Term Life InsuranceliliShort and Long Term DisabilityliliFlexible Spending Account for qualifying expensesliliPet InsuranceliliVoluntary Supplemental BenefitsliliEducation Reimbursement ProgramsliliProfessional Development and Job TrainingliliWellness Programs with opportunity to earn up to 300 per yearliulWe strive for innovation targeted at delivering a customercentric experience while transforming the online shopping experience We change direction and define ourselves in the idea that individually we are incredible but united our growth is infinite and paramount to our success iHerb strives to be the global industry leaderbrbriHerb is an Equal Opportunity employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin disability or veteran status iHerb provides
